name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-organization-chart
title: Organization Chart (SP2019 and Online)
shortDescription: Shows an organization chart based on specified user, and user can navigate to show company organization
longDescription: This web part shows an organization chart based on specified user, and user can navigate to show company organization.
Can be installed on SharePoint Server 2019, and SharePoint Online.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
